Generation VI.X: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
Generation VI.Y: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Any poison this Pokémon takes in is converted into a black powder and secreted. That's why Scatterbug can eat poisonous leaves and roots.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon scatters poisonous powder to repel enemies. It will eat different plants depending on where it lives.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Five , Poco Path
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Five , Poco Path
